price: Ta ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Yãya yãro zai kasance a gare ni, alhãli kuwa wani mutum bai shãfe ni ba?" (Allah) Ya ce: "Kamar wannan ne, Allah yana halittar abin da Yake so. Idan Ya hukunta wani al'amari, sai ya ce masa, "Ka kasance!, Sai yana kasancẽwa."
arabic: قَالَتۡ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِي وَلَدٞ وَلَمۡ يَمۡسَسۡنِي بَشَرٞۖ قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ ٱللَّهُ يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمۡرٗا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālat rabbi annā yakūnu lī waladun walam yamsasnī basharun qāla kadhāliki al-lahu yakhluqu mā yashāu idhā qaḍā amran fa-innamā yaqūlu lahu kun fayakūnu
